column4: I remember now: first install, a SQUASHFS error, no way to solve the bug. Second install, a crash from migrating 9/04 to 9.10. Now, the separate /var partition.
This is more a windows joke than a serious way to build distros. I m sorry to have to say that
How can I seriously recommend to my noob friends (in linux) the change to the linux part if I can t even boot from a livecd?!!!!
please remember this channel is for support
